Html: Will there be support for Windows Server 2008 R2?
Are you looking for a tool that will create bootable USBs/DVDs from Windows Server ISOs?  Or what support are you looking for exactly?

I found this page that allows you to use any .iso file and use the Windows 7 USB/DVD download tool: http://www.withinwindows.com/2009/11/01/use-the-windows-7-usbdvd-download-tool-with-custom-isos/

I am testing it now and will let you know if it works.

-Mike
